# About

The first session of the Bayesian statistics study group will take place on 17th of April.

The book that we will use is [Bayesian Data Analysis](https://www.amazon.com/Bayesian-Analysis-Chapman-Statistical-Science/dp/1439840954) by Andrew Gelman et al.

In our first session, we will cover Chapter 1 of the book.

Looking forward to seeing you there!
